item.title: My First Contract
item.description:
Recently, I crossed a major milestone, I landed my first freelance contract for a local startup NGO doing good work. They needed digital presence. I built them a site and integrated a Content Management System that the admin can use to draft content they want to display on the website and the site builds and deploys automatically
